item.title: Starting to Use GitHub
item.description:
So, I finally pushed some of my code to GitHub and managed to get this blog up and running on the web.

I've still got a long way to go to get good with these tools but I'm happy to be progressing. Next stop is to upgrade the theme of this blog to see if I can make it's look sync a little more with my personal taste.
item.dc:creator: Farrell Kramer

item.title: New Blog Using Python
item.description:
Given my new desire to learn Python, I've created this new blog to chronicle my new coding adventures. This blog is created using the static blog generator Pelican, which is written in Python.

I'm writing this at the NY Python Meetup, and as it seems to be working I haven't had to speak with anyone yet. Perhaps I shall later.
item.dc:creator: Farrell Kramer
